events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for applying and we will review your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for the Software Developer role based on your submitted resume and experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering recruitment has been assigned to your candidacy and will be in touch shortly to guide you through the next steps.
We have completed the initial screening of your profile and would like to schedule a brief call to discuss your background and motivations.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the call. We appreciate your prompt response and look forward to speaking with you soon.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10:00 AM UTC. This session will assess your coding and problem-solving skills.
You completed the technical interview successfully. The interviewers appreciated your coding approach and problem-solving capabilities.
The HR interview has been scheduled for you on May 15th at 3 PM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career goals.
You had a positive HR interview where your alignment with the company's values and expectations was well established.
We are delighted to extend you a job offer for the Software Engineer role. Please review the attached offer letter and let us know your decision.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer. We are excited about the possibility of you joining our engineering team.
You have accepted our offer. We look forward to welcoming you onboard and will provide further details about your start date and onboarding process.
Your onboarding process has officially started. You will receive access to our systems and introductory training sessions to get you up to speed.
The hiring process is now closed. We are thrilled to have you as part of the engineering team and anticipate great successes together.
